document_data.name: Grigarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Grigarr''' was a terrifying man who trained the [[wyvern]]s of [[Darkhold]] in the [[Far Hills]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The [[ranger]] was heavily scarred due to multiple wyvern stings.
document_data.Personality: The wyvern trainer was a combination of both terrifying and greedy. He believed that he was entertaining as a storyteller because of the good reactions of the locals, but the truth was that they humored him in their outright fear. Grigarr also claimed to be immune to wyvern [[venom]].
document_data.Activities: Grigarr was known to tell residents of Darkhold (especially in the local tavern known as the [[Rookery]]) about his experiences with the wyverns he trained, particularly about all the times he was strung.
document_data.History: After the groups of [[giant]]s that defended Darkhold were no longer present, wyverns were bred and trained to obey [[Pereghost]], the undisputed commander of the Keep of the Far Hills. Grigarr was the one who trained these wyverns.
